documents.document: “No one in the whole world knows all a man’s bignesses and all his littlenesses as his wife does.” ~Gene Stratton-Porter #GQ #quote
“Paint me an eternal tea-pot, for I usually drink tea from eight o’clock at night to four o’clock in the morning.” ~Thomas de Quincey #quote
Beautiful thanks @just1heather @kbthing2 :)
@kbthing2 Hi Kathryn! My day was great, thanks for asking. Had some drama last night, but I’m alright :) Have a great school day tomorrow!
“The absolute good is not a matter of opinion but of nature.” ~Cicero #GQ #quote
“For how many things, which for our own sake we should never do, do we perform for the sake of our friends.” ~Cicero #GQ #friendship #quote
@Hederrr It seems so. Not sure if that’s good or bad ;)
“Optimism is essential to achievement and it is also the foundation of courage and true progress.” ~Nicholas Murray Butler #optimism #quote
“It is a very lonely life that a man leads, who becomes aware of truths before their times.” ~Thomas Brackett Reed #GQ #truth #quote
Twitter removed the retweet feature. Please retweet.
“The great threat to the young and pure in heart is not what they read but what they don’t read.” ~Heywood Broun #GQ #reading #quote
@oOoOoBarracuda Oh, I’m sorry to hear that! I hope you have a great one today. You can actually make that decision :)
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “Make measurable progress in reasonable time.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
@Hederrr I’m just me, but I’m happy you had a good day ;)
Had an excellent day! Great friends, great workout, great food, everything is beautiful. How about you? :)
@just1heather “If at first you don’t succeed, just chai, and chai again.” ~@Good_Quotes :) #quote
“The stupid believe that to be truthful is easy. Only the artist—the great artist—knows how difficult it is.” ~Willa Cather #GQ #art #quote
“The habit of reading is the only enjoyment in which there is no alloy—it lasts when all other pleasures fade.” ~Anthony Trollope #GQ #quote
“You don’t learn style from watching people on a runway. Fashion happens every morning when you wake up.” ~Shalom Harlow #GQ #morning #quote
“A song without music is a lot like H² without the O.” ~Ira Gershwin #GQ #music #quote
@KCJuGGaLoTuS Yes, hence the “so far” bit, but I’ll get back to you on Friday, although I already know how it’s going to be :)
“Happiness is the real sense of fulfillment that comes from hard work.” ~Joseph Barbara #GQ #happiness #quote
“Don’t go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.” ~Mark Twain #GQ #attitude #quote
I’ve had an excellent day and, in fact, an excellent week so far :) How about you?
@just1heather Thank you, slowly but surely :)
@just1heather “The price of wisdom is eternal thought.” ~Francis ‘Frank’ Birch :) #GQ #wisdom #quote
“To stop the flow of music would be like the stopping of time itself—incredible and inconceivable.” ~Aaron Copland #GQ #music #quote
“… One day, I will be faith-filled, I’ll be trusting and spacious authentic and grounded and whole” ~Alanis #lyrics #quote #mm
“One day, I will speak freely, I’ll be less afraid, and measured outside of my poems and lyrics and art…” ~Alanis #lyrics #quote #mm
“… Ever unfolding, ever expanding, ever adventurous, and torturous, but never done…” ~Alanis #lyrics #quote #mm
“… and I have been missing the rapture this whole time, of being forever incomplete…” ~Alanis #lyrics #quote #mm
“I have been running so sweaty my whole life, urgent for a finish line…” ~Alanis #lyrics #quote #mm
“… One day, I will be healed, I will gather my wounds forge the end of tragic comedy…” ~Alanis #lyrics #quote #mm
“… One day, I’ll be at peace, I’ll be enlightened, and I’ll be married with children and maybe adopt…” ~Alanis #lyrics #quote #mm
“One day, I’ll find relief, I’ll be arrived, and I’ll be a friend to my friends who know how to be friends…” ~Alanis #lyrics #quote #mm
@just1heather Well, I didn’t, but now I do! Consider it a gift to you, then :)
“… say what you are and who your heart beats for, it’s an open door, it’s your life” ~Francesca Battistelli #lyrics #musicmonday
“It’s your life, what you gonna do? The world is watching you, every day the choices you make…” ~Francesca Battistelli #lyrics #musicmonday
@just1heather Thank you ma’am! :) Also thanks to @haydeenyy @MsDivaRoyale for the RTs :)
“…Back on a track with a better view, and I’m getting closer to perfection ’cause of you” ~Alexandra #lyrics #musicmonday
“Back in the light getting over you, now I got it together, I’m stronger than ever…” ~Alexandra #lyrics #musicmonday
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “The book you don’t read won’t help.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
“Every human being is a multi-touch interface.” ~@Good_Quotes #quote
“Being considerate of others will take you further in life than a college degree.” ~Marian Wright Edelman #GQ #kindness #quote
Off to the gym, yay! Love life :)
“We are built to make mistakes, coded for error.” ~Lewis Thomas #GQ #nobodysperfect #quote
“The difficulty of literature is not to write, but to write what you mean.” ~Robert Louis Stevenson #GQ #writing #quote
@just1heather I’m not! I’m just saying, that’s all :)

“Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.” ~Thomas ‘Tom’ Robbins #GQ #commitment #quote

“A new day is worth a thousand tomorrows.” ~Benjamin Franklin #GQ #life #quote
“The beginning is always today.” ~Mary Wollstonecraft #GQ #life #beginning #quote

“Life does not have to be perfect to be wonderful.” ~Annette Funicello #GQ #life #quote
“Write in your heart that every day is the best day of the year.” ~Ralph Waldo Emerson #GQ #life #quote
“We leave traces of ourselves wherever we go, on whatever we touch.” ~Lewis Thomas #GQ #life #quote

I’ve been having a great day, how about you?

#19: "You see things; and you say 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?'" #quote
#15: "Happiness is like a kiss---in order to get any good out of it, you have to give it somebody else." ~Unknown #quote
What? No good? You want more than two random numbers? :) Well, alrighty then…
19 and 29, but since they both fell in the same person, a new number was generated, so the final numbers are 15 and 19! :)
Then a true random number generator (http://cli.gs/rand) was used to determine the winning ID numbers. And the numbers are…
First, each quote was assigned an ID number based on the order in which they were received.
Great! So here we go, the #GoogleWave invites are finally about to be served. Apologies for the delay.
So, how about now. Are you ready? :)
“The time is always right to do what is right.” ~Martin Luther King Jr. #GQ #life #quote
“One’s destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things.” ~Henry Miller #GQ #life #quote
“I’m not afraid of storms, for I’m learning how to sail my ship.” ~Louisa May Alcott #GQ #courage #life #quote
“It sometimes happens that a woman is handsomer at twenty-nine than she was ten years before.” ~Jane Austen #GQ #age #beauty #quote
“Our greatest natural resource is the minds of our children.” ~Walter ‘Walt’ Disney #GQ #children #quote
“Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm.” ~Ralph Waldo Emerson #GQ #enthusiasm #quote
“Things turn out best for the people who make the best of the way things turn out.” ~John Wooden #GQ #life #quote
“We all have a fear of the unknown. What one does with that fear will make all the difference in the world.” ~Lillian Russell #GQ #quote
RT @Jim_Rohn_Quotes: “Learn how to be happy with what you have while you pursue all that you want.” ~Jim Rohn #jimrohn #quote
I guess nobody’s ready. So we’ll wait. Let me know when :)
